please. I too would like to download this DVD. I ran a BBS for many many years in my early life.  First on a CMB 64 with IEE-488 8250LP Dual 1Meg 5.25" drives. Then on an Amiga 1000 with a home brew ST506 RLL 32Meg Hard drive. Them were the days!. I'd love to watch this old doco on the good old days. I am happy to seed for a while afterwards also. My BBS was `The Transcendental CONNECTION'. :)

Hey, kids.

It's Jason Scott, director of the BBS Documentary. I just wanted to stop in and leave a note about how this particular torrent has been seeded and downloaded for over TWO YEARS! An amazing thing, considering how quick stuff comes and goes with the torrents. I hope you've all been enjoying the movie, and I'm working on a new one, at http://www.getlamp.com (GET LAMP, which is about text adventures).

Keep enjoying the movie.
